Generation VIII.Sword: Powerful legs and jaws made it the apex predator of its time. Its own overhunting of its prey was what drove it to extinction.
Generation VIII.Shield: Its mighty legs are capable of running at speeds exceeding 40 mph , but this Pokémon can't breathe unless it's underwater.

Generation VIII.Sword: Revive from Fossilized Fish and Fossilized Drake by Cara Liss on Route 6
Generation VIII.Shield: Revive from Fossilized Fish and Fossilized Drake by Cara Liss on Route 6
